entry.title: Re @fallacyalarm The banks have higher required capital post gfc so the economy’s money multiplier is now structurally much lower. Also if RRP become...
entry.summary: Re @fallacyalarm The banks have higher required capital post gfc so the economy’s money multiplier is now structurally much lower. Also if RRP becomes less attractive the banks can’t just put it in the economy - high liquidity partly a reflection of a credit demand problem

DavidHoffman.bedrock 🏴🦇🔊🔴_🔴: @KyleSamani The L1 <> L2 <> L2 structure creates a collaborate/competitive tension that results in an equilibrium where resources are shared, but shared most efficiently and effectively. A “grow the pie” dynamic equilibrium

Forgiven: Arbitrum 空投之夜停机之谜 日前主任怒锤一波以太神教只搞迷信,不重视技术,激发了大量声讨,调查结果： 1. 负载最重时,出快正常,但排序器出现问题,性能严重下降,官方RPC和Airdop前端宕机,区块浏览器20mins未更新数据 2. 排序器每秒700万Gas是软限制,之后Gas Price会飙升限流,真实环境极限120～150TPS

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

entry.summary: RT 𝐳𝐤-𝐁𝐮𝐧𝐧𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐟 🐇 Generations of war & business correlate closely. However there's a lag; war is 1 cycle ahead and leads business strategy. I believe warfare is also a proxy for DeFi generations. This is part 2 of 3 analyzing cycles of business and war, and using them to predict DeFi’s future 🧵 https://t.co/GYZcMm8Qxd
